# jute <img src="man/figures/logo.png" class="logo" alt="jute logo" width="60" height="72" />

### author: Toni Price
### 09 Jan 2020

The <span class="code">jute</span> R package provides a collection of sundry
utility functions.

<!-- ======================================================================= -->
## Installation

You can install the development version of <span class="code">jute</span> from
github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")   # [if not already installed]
devtools::install_github("toniprice/jute")
```
